content: STS Ni-BTC was synthesized via a solvothermal process reported previously. Briefly, 0.43 g of Ni­(NO3)·6H2O, 0.205 g of 1,3,5-trimesic acid (BTC), 0.055 g of 2-methyl-imidazole, and 15 mL of N, N-dimethylformamide (DMF) were put into a 20 mL Teflon-lined autoclave and heated at 170 °C for 2 days. After allowing to room temperature, the crystals were washed with DMF and ethanol subsequently for 3 times, and finally dried under vacuum at 80 °C for 24 h. STS Fe-BTC was synthesized via a solvothermal process reported previously with corresponding alterations: 1.1999 g of Fe­(NO3)3·9H2O, 0.4129 g of BTC, 0.2976 mL of HF solution (40 wt %), and 15 mL of H2O were put into a 20 mL Teflon-lined autoclave and heated at 150 °C for 84 h. After allowing to room temperature, the orange crystals were centrifuged. A treatment in hot deionized water (80 °C) for 3 h and followed by hot ethanol (60 °C) for 1h was applied to decrease the amount of residual BTC. The final products were washed with ethanol and dried vacuum at 80 °C for 24 h. STS FeNi-BTC was synthesized with the identical method of STS Ni-BTC in the presence of Fe­(NO3)3·9H2O with the Fe/Ni molar ratio of 1/10.
clean_text:
Solvothermal Synthesis (STS) of STS Ni-BTC, STS Fe-BTC, and STS Fe/Ni-BTC

STS Ni-BTC was synthesized via a solvothermal process reported previously. Briefly, 0.43 g of Ni(NO3)⋅6H2O, 0.205 g of 1,3,5-trimesic acid (BTC), 0.055 g of 2-methyl-imidazole, and 15 mL of N, N-dimethylformamide (DMF) were put into a 20 mL Teflon-lined autoclave and heated at 170 °C for 2 days. After allowing to room temperature, the crystals were washed with DMF and ethanol subsequently for 3 times, and finally dried under vacuum at 80 °C for 24 h. STS Fe-BTC was synthesized via a solvothermal process reported previously with corresponding alterations: 1.1999 g of Fe(NO3)3⋅9H2O, 0.4129 g of BTC, 0.2976 mL of HF solution (40 wt %), and 15 mL of H2O were put into a 20 mL Teflon-lined autoclave and heated at 150 °C for 84 h. After allowing to room temperature, the orange crystals were centrifuged. A treatment in hot deionized water (80 °C) for 3 h and followed by hot ethanol (60 °C) for 1h was applied to decrease the amount of residual BTC. The final products were washed with ethanol and dried vacuum at 80 °C for 24 h. STS FeNi-BTC was synthesized with the identical method of STS Ni-BTC in the presence of Fe(NO3)3⋅9H2O with the Fe/Ni molar ratio of 1/10.

processes.washing solution: hot deionized water (80 °C) and hot ethanol (60 °C)
